alert.note: Alert for Jasper (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 11:05PM CDT until May 04 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR EASTERN JASPER COUNTY... At 1105 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jasper to 9 miles northeast of Carthage to 6 miles north of Sarcoxie, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Carthage... Carytown... Avilla... Maple Grove... Dudenville... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 39 and 53. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
